data.eml:eml: A new species of Western Atlantic sea lily in the family Bathycrinidae (Echinodermata: Crinoidea), with a discussion of relationships between crinoids with xenomorphic stalks

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mironov, Alexandr N., Pawson, David L. (2014): A new species of Western Atlantic sea lily in the family Bathycrinidae (Echinodermata: Crinoidea), with a discussion of relationships between crinoids with xenomorphic stalks. Zootaxa 3873 (3): 259-274, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3873.3.5
